page.title: 09Shipham Church Fete.
page.content: {A Six Year Old's Thoughts. One Saturday I woke up and I jumped out of bed. I got washed and I had my breakfast. I had muesli with milk, then toast and marmalade. Then I went in the Best Turned Out Competition. I went in as clean as can be. I won first prize and then we came home and we had our dinner. {A Seven Year Old's Comments. When I woke up one Saturday morning, it was the Church Fete day. We had to wear our school shorts and tee shirts for the Country Dancing display. There were lots of stalls. When the dancing was over I was glad because then I went on the Bouncy Castle. It was filled with air and we could jump around. Then I looked at the stalls. I enjoyed the dancing. It was fun.
